Package Services

Class MenuService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.MenuService
  • public class MenuService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for managing menu items. Provides methods to interact with the database and perform CRUD operations on menu items.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MenuService()

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener​(MenuListener listener)
        Adds a listener to be notified when menu data changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to be added.

      • getAllMenuItems

        public java.util.List<MenuItem> getAllMenuItems()
        Retrieves a list of all menu items.
        Returns:
        A list of menu items, or an empty list if an error occurs.

      • getComponents

        public java.lang.String getComponents​(int menu_item_id)
        Retrieves the component ingredients for a menu item.
        Parameters:
        menu_item_id - The ID of the menu item.
        Returns:
        A comma-separated string of ingredient names, or an empty string if an error occurs.

      • getMenuItemByID

        public MenuItem getMenuItemByID​(int menuItemID)
        Retrieves a menu item by its unique ID.
        Parameters:
        menuItemID - The ID of the menu item.
        Returns:
        The corresponding MenuItem object, or a default object if not found.

      • getMenuItemByName

        public MenuItem getMenuItemByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves a menu item by its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the menu item.
        Returns:
        The corresponding MenuItem object, or a default object if not found.

      • AddMenuItem

        public void AddMenuItem​(java.lang.String itemName,
                        java.lang.String category,
                        java.math.BigDecimal price,
                        java.lang.String itemComps)
        Adds a new menu item to the database. Also ensures that all necessary ingredients exist in the inventory.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the menu item.
        category - The category of the menu item.
        price - The price of the menu item.
        itemComps - A comma-separated string of component ingredient names.

      • UpdateMenuItem

        public int UpdateMenuItem​(int menuItemId,
                          java.math.BigDecimal newPrice,
                          java.lang.String newCategory,
                          java.lang.String newName,
                          java.lang.String itemComps)
        Updates the details of an existing menu item, including its components.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - The ID of the menu item to update.
        newPrice - The new price of the menu item.
        newCategory - The new category of the menu item.
        newName - The new name of the menu item.
        itemComps - A comma-separated string of component ingredient names.
        Returns:
        1 if successful, -1 if an error occurs.

      • DeleteMenuItem

        public int DeleteMenuItem​(int menuItemId)
        Deletes a menu item from the database.
        Parameters:
        menuItemId - The ID of the menu item to delete.
        Returns:
        1 if successful, 0 if failed, -1 if an error occurs.

                        java.lang.String itemComps)
